text: Ghulam Ali wahdat is an ethnic Hazara politician in Afghanistan. He was the governor of Bamyan Province from (October, 2013 to June, 2015). Gholamali Vahdat, son of Nawazesh Ali, was born in the year 1962 in Bamyan Province, Afghanistan. == References == Category:Hazara politicians Category:Bamyan Province Category:1962 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century Afghan people
title: Ghulam Ali Wahdat
